JONES
v.
HARRELSON & SMITH CONTRACTORS. No. 36A07. Supreme Court of North Carolina. February 15, 2007. William F. Ward, III, Chicago, IL, J. Donald Cowan, Jr., Angela L. Little, Greensboro, for Jones. Donald S. Higley, II, Greenville, for Harrelson & Smith Contractors. Hannah G. Styron, Raleigh, for NCADA, Amicus. Burton Craige, Raleigh, for NCATL.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 14th day of February 2007 by N.C. Association of Defense Attorneys and the N.C. Academy of Trial Lawyers for leave to file Amicus Curiae Brief:

"Motion Allowed. Unless already submitted, the Amicus Brief shall be submitted to the court within the times allowed and in the manner provided by Appellate Rule 28(i). By order of the Court in conference this the 15th day of February 2007."
